channel.title: How to add d claws to a 317?
channel.description: Dose anyone know? I have no clue.. I know i gotta find it in RSMV but thats all... If someone could write a tutorial about it it would be great.

item.source: How to add d claws to a 317?

item.title: How to add d claws to a 317?
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

well first you have to get the model, when i added it was like model number 40000 or something like that. Really high up. Then you open the model and you have to save it as a different file to work with a 317. The name escapes me atm but i can look it up for you. Then after you convert it you add it to your client then proceed to edit how it is worn in class8.java if(i == 13666){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = (model id); class8.anInt181 = 630; class8.anInt190 = 268; class8.anInt198 = 1340; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -7; class8.anInt194 = -13; class8.anInt165 = (model id); class8.anInt200 = (model id); class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Dragon claws"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A set of fighting claws.".getBytes(); } you can use that if you want so you dont have to spend time fixing the position of it. Then change the the model id to the title of the model you put of it in the models section of your client. Then compile and spawn and you got d claws. Then just go to item.cfg and add the stats

Read full topic
